Type Definitions.html#/c:RLMMigration.h@.name: RLMObjectMigrationBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:RLMMigration.h@.abstract: A block type which provides both the old and new versions of an object in the Realm. Object

Type Definitions.html#/c:RLMRealm.h@T@RL.name: RLMNotificationBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:RLMRealm.h@T@RL.abstract: The type of a block to run whenever the data within the Realm is modified.

Type Definitions.html#/c:RLMRealm.h@T@RL.name: RLMMigrationBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:RLMRealm.h@T@RL.abstract: The type of a migration block used to migrate a Realm.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: count
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: The number of objects in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: objectClassName
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: The class name (i.e. type) of the RLMObjects contained in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: realm
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: The Realm which manages the collection, or nil for unmanaged collections.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -objectAtIndex:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns the object at the index specified.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -firstObject
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns the first object in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -lastObject
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns the last object in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -indexOfObject:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns the index of an object in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -indexOfObjectWhere:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns the index of the first object in the collection matching the predicate.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -indexOfObjectWithPredicate:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns the index of the first object in the collection matching the predicate.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -objectsWhere:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns all objects matching the given predicate in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -objectsWithPredicate:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns all objects matching the given predicate in the collection.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -valueForKey:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Returns an NSArray containing the results of invoking valueForKey: using key on each of the collection’s objects.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -setValue:forKey:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Invokes setValue:forKey: on each of the collection’s objects using the specified value and key.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).name: -addNotificationBlock:
Protocols/RLMCollection.html#/c:objc(pl).abstract: Registers a block to be called each time the collection changes.

Protocols/RLMCollection.html.name: RLMCollection
Protocols/RLMCollection.html.abstract: A homogenous collection of RLMObject instances. Examples of conforming types include RLMArray,

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorFail
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes a general error that occurred when trying to open a Realm.

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorFileAccess
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes a file I/O error that occurred when trying to open a Realm.

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorFilePermissionDenied
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes a file permission error that ocurred when trying to open a Realm.

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorFileExists
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes an error where a file was to be written to disk, but another file with the same name already exists.

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorFileNotFound
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes an error that occurs if a file could not be found.

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorFileFormatUpgradeRequired
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes an error that occurs if a file format upgrade is required to open the file,

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorIncompatibleLockFile
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes an error that occurs if the database file is currently open in another

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorAddressSpaceExhausted
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes an error that occurs when there is insufficient available address space.

Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.name: RLMErrorSchemaMismatch
Enums/RLMError.html#/c:@E@RLMError@RLMEr.abstract: Denotes an error that occurs if there is a schema version mismatch, so that a migration is required.

Enums/RLMPropertyType.html#/c:@E@RLMProp.name: RLMPropertyTypeObject
Enums/RLMPropertyType.html#/c:@E@RLMProp.abstract: Realm model objects. See Realm Models for more information.

Enums/RLMPropertyType.html#/c:@E@RLMProp.name: RLMPropertyTypeArray
Enums/RLMPropertyType.html#/c:@E@RLMProp.abstract: Realm arrays. See Realm Models for more information.

Enums/RLMPropertyType.html#/c:@E@RLMProp.name: RLMPropertyTypeLinkingObjects
Enums/RLMPropertyType.html#/c:@E@RLMProp.abstract: Realm linking objects. See Realm Models for more information.

Enums/RLMPropertyType.html.name: RLMPropertyType
Enums/RLMPropertyType.html.abstract: RLMPropertyType is an enumeration describing all property types supported in Realm models.

Enums/RLMError.html.name: RLMError
Enums/RLMError.html.abstract: RLMError is an enumeration representing all recoverable errors. It is associated with the

Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmRefreshRequir.name: RLMRealmRefreshRequiredNotification
Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmRefreshRequir.abstract: This notification is posted by a Realm when the data in that Realm has changed.

Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmDidChangeNoti.name: RLMRealmDidChangeNotification
Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmDidChangeNoti.abstract: This notification is posted by a Realm when a write transaction has been

Constants.html#/c:@RLMNotVersioned.name: RLMNotVersioned
Constants.html#/c:@RLMNotVersioned.abstract: The schema version used for uninitialized Realms

Constants.html#/c:@RLMUnknownSystemError.name: RLMUnknownSystemErrorDomain
Constants.html#/c:@RLMUnknownSystemError.abstract: An error domain identifying non-specific system errors.

Constants.html#/c:@RLMExceptionName.name: RLMExceptionName
Constants.html#/c:@RLMExceptionName.abstract: The corresponding value is the name of an exception thrown by Realm.

Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmVersionKey.name: RLMRealmVersionKey
Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmVersionKey.abstract: The corresponding value is a Realm file version.

Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmCoreVersionKe.name: RLMRealmCoreVersionKey
Constants.html#/c:@RLMRealmCoreVersionKe.abstract: The corresponding key is the version of the underlying database engine.

Constants.html#/c:@RLMInvalidatedKey.name: RLMInvalidatedKey
Constants.html#/c:@RLMInvalidatedKey.abstract: The corresponding key is the Realm invalidated property name.

Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.name: objectSchema
Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.abstract: An NSArray containing RLMObjectSchemas for all object types in the Realm.

Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.name: -schemaForClassName:
Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.abstract: Returns an RLMObjectSchema for the given class name in the schema.

Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.name: -objectForKeyedSubscript:
Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.abstract: Looks up and returns an RLMObjectSchema for the given class name in the Realm.

Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.name: -isEqualToSchema:
Classes/RLMSchema.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMSch.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two RLMSchema instances are equivalent.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: count
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: The number of objects in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: objectClassName
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: The class name (i.e. type) of the RLMObjects contained in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: realm
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: The Realm which manages this results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: invalidated
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Indicates if the results collection is no longer valid.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -objectAtIndex:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the object at the index specified.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -firstObject
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the first object in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -lastObject
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the last object in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -indexOfObject:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the index of an object in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -indexOfObjectWhere:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the index of the first object in the results collection matching the predicate.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -indexOfObjectWithPredicate:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the index of the first object in the results collection matching the predicate.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -objectsWhere:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns all the objects matching the given predicate in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -objectsWithPredicate:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns all the objects matching the given predicate in the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -sortedResultsUsingProperty:ascending:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns a sorted RLMResults from an existing results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -sortedResultsUsingDescriptors:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns a sorted RLMResults from an existing results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -addNotificationBlock:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Registers a block to be called each time the results collection changes.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -minOfProperty:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the minimum (lowest) value of the given property among all the objects

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -maxOfProperty:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the maximum (highest) value of the given property among all the objects represented by the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -sumOfProperty:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the sum of the values of a given property over all the objects represented by the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -averageOfProperty:
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: Returns the average value of a given property over the objects represented by the results collection.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: -init
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: -[RLMResults init] is not available because RLMResults cannot be created directly.

Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.name: +new
Classes/RLMResults.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMRe.abstract: +[RLMResults new] is not available because RLMResults cannot be created directly.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: +defaultConfiguration
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: Returns the default configuration used to create Realms when no other

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: +setDefaultConfiguration:
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: Sets the default configuration to the given RLMRealmConfiguration.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: fileURL
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: The local URL of the Realm file. Mutually exclusive with inMemoryIdentifier.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: inMemoryIdentifier
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: A string used to identify a particular in-memory Realm. Mutually exclusive with path.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: encryptionKey
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: A 64-byte key to use to encrypt the data, or nil if encryption is not enabled.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: readOnly
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: Whether the Realm is read-only (must be YES for read-only files).

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: migrationBlock
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: The block which migrates the Realm to the current version.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: deleteRealmIfMigrationNeeded
Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: Whether to recreate the Realm file with the provided schema if a migration is required.

Classes/RLMNotificationToken.html#/c:obj.name: -stop
Classes/RLMNotificationToken.html#/c:obj.abstract: Stops notifications for the change subscription that returned this token.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: +defaultRealm
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Obtains an instance of the default Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: +realmWithConfiguration:error:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Obtains an RLMRealm instance with the given configuration.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: +realmWithURL:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Obtains an RLMRealm instance persisted at a specified file URL.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: schema
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: The RLMSchema used by the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: inWriteTransaction
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Indicates if the Realm is currently engaged in a write transaction.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: configuration
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: The RLMRealmConfiguration object that was used to create this RLMRealm instance.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: isEmpty
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Indicates if this Realm contains any objects.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -addNotificationBlock:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Adds a notification handler for changes in this Realm, and returns a notification token.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -beginWriteTransaction
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Begins a write transaction on the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -commitWriteTransaction
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Commits all write operations in the current write transaction, and ends the

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -commitWriteTransaction:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Commits all write operations in the current write transaction, and ends the

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -cancelWriteTransaction
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Reverts all writes made during the current write transaction and ends the transaction.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -transactionWithBlock:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Performs actions contained within the given block inside a write transaction.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -transactionWithBlock:error:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Performs actions contained within the given block inside a write transaction.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -refresh
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Updates the Realm and outstanding objects managed by the Realm to point to the most recent data.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: autorefresh
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Set this property to YES to automatically update this Realm when changes happen in other threads.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -writeCopyToURL:encryptionKey:error:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Writes a compacted and optionally encrypted copy of the Realm to the given local URL.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -invalidate
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Invalidates all RLMObjects and RLMResults managed by the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -addObject:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Adds an object to the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -addObjects:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Adds all the objects in a collection to the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -addOrUpdateObject:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Adds or updates an existing object into the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -addOrUpdateObjectsFromArray:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Adds or updates all the objects in a collection into the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -deleteObject:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Deletes an object from the Realm. Once the object is deleted it is considered invalidated.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -deleteObjects:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Deletes one or more objects from the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: -deleteAllObjects
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Deletes all objects from the Realm.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: +schemaVersionAtURL:encryptionKey:error:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Returns the schema version for a Realm at a given local URL.

Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.name: +migrateRealm:
Classes/RLMRealm.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMReal.abstract: Performs the given Realm configuration’s migration block on a Realm at the given path.

Classes/RLMProperty.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMP.name: objectClassName
Classes/RLMProperty.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMP.abstract: For RLMObject and RLMArray properties, the name of the class of object stored in the property.

Classes/RLMProperty.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMP.name: linkOriginPropertyName
Classes/RLMProperty.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMP.abstract: For linking objects properties, the property name of the property the linking objects property is linked to.

Classes/RLMProperty.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMP.name: -isEqualToProperty:
Classes/RLMProperty.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMP.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given property object is equal to the receiver.

Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).name: properties
Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: An array of RLMProperty instances representing the persisted properties of a class described by the schema.

Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).name: className
Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The name of the class the schema describes.

Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).name: primaryKeyProperty
Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The property which serves as the primary key for the class the schema describes, if any.

Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -objectForKeyedSubscript:
Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Retrieves an RLMProperty object by the property name.

Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).name: -isEqualToObjectSchema:
Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two RLMObjectSchema instances are equal.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: -init
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Initializes an unmanaged instance of a Realm object.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: -initWithValue:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Initializes an unmanaged instance of a Realm object.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +className
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns the class name for a Realm object subclass.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +createInDefaultRealmWithValue:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Creates an instance of a Realm object with a given value, and adds it to the default Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +createInRealm:withValue:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Creates an instance of a Realm object with a given value, and adds it to the specified Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +createOrUpdateInDefaultRealmWithValue:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Creates or updates a Realm object within the default Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +createOrUpdateInRealm:withValue:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Creates or updates an Realm object within a specified Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: realm
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: The Realm which manages the object, or nil if the object is unmanaged.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: objectSchema
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: The object schema which lists the persisted properties for the object.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: invalidated
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Indicates if the object can no longer be accessed because it is now invalid.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +indexedProperties
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns an array of property names for properties which should be indexed.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +defaultPropertyValues
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Override this method to specify the default values to be used for each property.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +primaryKey
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Override this method to specify the name of a property to be used as the primary key.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +ignoredProperties
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Override this method to specify the names of properties to ignore. These properties will not be persisted within

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +requiredProperties
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Override this method to specify the names of properties that are non-optional (i.e. cannot be assigned a nil value).

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +linkingObjectsProperties
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Override this method to provide information related to properties containing linking objects.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +allObjects
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns all objects of this object type from the default Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +objectsWhere:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns all objects of this object type matching the given predicate from the default Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +objectsWithPredicate:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns all objects of this object type matching the given predicate from the default Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Retrieves the single instance of this object type with the given primary key from the default Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +allObjectsInRealm:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns all objects of this object type from the specified Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +objectsInRealm:where:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns all objects of this object type matching the given predicate from the specified Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +objectsInRealm:withPredicate:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns all objects of this object type matching the given predicate from the specified Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: +objectInRealm:forPrimaryKey:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Retrieves the single instance of this object type with the given primary key from the specified Realm.

Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.name: -isEqualToObject:
Classes/RLMObject.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMObj.abstract: Returns YES if another Realm object instance points to the same object as the receiver in the Realm managing

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: oldSchema
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Returns the old RLMSchema. This is the schema which describes the Realm before the

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: newSchema
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Returns the new RLMSchema. This is the schema which describes the Realm after the

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: -enumerateObjects:block:
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Enumerates all the objects of a given type in the Realm, providing both the old and new versions

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: -createObject:withValue:
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Creates and returns an RLMObject instance of type className in the Realm being migrated.

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: -deleteObject:
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Deletes an object from a Realm during a migration.

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: -deleteDataForClassName:
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Deletes the data for the class with the given name.

Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.name: -renamePropertyForClass:oldName:newName:
Classes/RLMMigration.html#/c:objc(cs)RLM.abstract: Renames a property of the given class from oldName to newName.

Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.name: deletions
Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.abstract: The indices of objects in the previous version of the collection which have

Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.name: insertions
Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.abstract: The indices in the new version of the collection which were newly inserted.

Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.name: modifications
Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.abstract: The indices in the new version of the collection which were modified.

Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.name: -deletionsInSection:
Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the index paths of the deletion indices in the given section.

Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.name: -insertionsInSection:
Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the index paths of the insertion indices in the given section.

Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.name: -modificationsInSection:
Classes/RLMCollectionChange.html#/c:objc.abstract: Returns the index paths of the modification indices in the given section.

Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.name: property
Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The name of the property which the sort descriptor orders results by.

Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.name: ascending
Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Whether the descriptor sorts in ascending or descending order.

Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.name: +sortDescriptorWithProperty:ascending:
Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns a new sort descriptor for the given property name and sort direction.

Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.name: -reversedSortDescriptor
Classes/RLMSortDescriptor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Returns a copy of the receiver with the sort direction reversed.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: count
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: The number of objects in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: objectClassName
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: The class name (i.e. type) of the RLMObjects contained in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: realm
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: The Realm which manages the array. Returns nil for unmanaged arrays.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: invalidated
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Indicates if the array can no longer be accessed.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -objectAtIndex:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns the object at the index specified.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -firstObject
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns the first object in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -lastObject
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns the last object in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -addObject:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Adds an object to the end of the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -addObjects:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Adds an array of objects to the end of the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -insertObject:atIndex:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Inserts an object at the given index.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -removeObjectAtIndex:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Removes an object at the given index.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -removeLastObject
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Removes the last object in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -removeAllObjects
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Removes all objects from the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -replaceObjectAtIndex:withObject:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Replaces an object at the given index with a new object.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -moveObjectAtIndex:toIndex:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Moves the object at the given source index to the given destination index.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -exchangeObjectAtIndex:withObjectAtIndex:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Exchanges the objects in the array at given indices.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -indexOfObject:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns the index of an object in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -indexOfObjectWhere:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns the index of the first object in the array matching the predicate.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -indexOfObjectWithPredicate:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns the index of the first object in the array matching the predicate.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -objectsWhere:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns all the objects matching the given predicate in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -objectsWithPredicate:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns all the objects matching the given predicate in the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -sortedResultsUsingProperty:ascending:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns a sorted RLMResults from the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -sortedResultsUsingDescriptors:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Returns a sorted RLMResults from the array.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -addNotificationBlock:
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: Registers a block to be called each time the array changes.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.name: -init
Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: -[RLMArray init] is not available because RLMArrays cannot be created directly.

Classes/RLMArray.html#/c:objc(cs)RLMArra.abstract: +[RLMArray new] is not available because RLMArrays cannot be created directly.

Classes/RLMArray.html.name: RLMArray
Classes/RLMArray.html.abstract: RLMArray is the container type in Realm used to define to-many relationships.

Classes/RLMMigration.html.abstract: RLMMigration instances encapsulate information intended to facilitate a schema migration.

Classes/RLMObject.html.name: RLMObject
Classes/RLMObject.html.abstract: RLMObject is a base class for model objects representing data stored in Realms.

Classes/RLMObjectSchema.html.abstract: This class represents Realm model object schemas.

Classes/RLMNotificationToken.html.abstract: A token which is returned from methods which subscribe to changes to a Realm.

Classes/RLMRealmConfiguration.html.abstract: An RLMRealmConfiguration instance describes the different options used to

Classes/RLMResults.html.abstract: RLMResults is an auto-updating container type in Realm returned from object
